Mikhael Manurung

            Mikhael Manurung
          
          
            
              Welcome to my personal site! I am a medical doctor attempting to transition to bioinformatics. I am currently doing my PhD and post-doc in the Leiden University Medical Center, where I use CyTOF, RNA-Seq, and scRNA-Seq to improve our understanding in immune response upon parasitic infection and vaccination.
            
            
              Welcome to my personal site! I am a medical doctor attempting to transition to bioinformatics. I am currently doing my PhD and post-doc in the Leiden University Medical Center, where I use CyTOF, RNA-Seq, and scRNA-Seq to improve our understanding in immune response upon parasitic infection and vaccination.
